metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14873 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the __multadd function of the newlib libc library, prior to versions 3.3.0 (see newlib/libc/stdlib/mprec.c), Balloc is used to allocate a big integer, however no check is performed to verify if the allocation succeeded or not. This will trigger a null pointer dereference bug in case of a memory allocation failure.

criterions.comment: gcc-snapshot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
newlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
